titleStmt.title: A defensive vindication of the publike liturgy, established ceremonies, and setled patrimony of the Church of England against such as (putting themselves to an ill occupation) have unjustly impeached or oppugned them / by a peaceable sonne of the same church, no way addicted to novelty or innovation.
titleStmt.author: Peaceable sonne of the same church.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
